description:
net: disable use of external listen along with other external network uses

By default the all.bash tests must not ever announce
on an external address.  It's not just an OS X issue.

messages.text:

net: disable use of external listen along with other external network uses

By default the all.bash tests must not ever announce
on an external address.  It's not just an OS X issue.
